name: Bohemian Wrapsody 15133
description:
Never change a winning team! 
Since Jules Bean received lots of positive feedback on this combination, we decided to listen to you and design another Bohemian Wrapsody in this lovely combination of purple, green and Indian Agate.

Sparkly bright min-green, old pink, dalmatian Jasper and black are the ingredients for this lively Bohemian Wrapsody with kind of a vintage-feel.

Materials; red Aventurine, Indian Agate, green Agate chips, bright green facetted Agate beads, Amazonite, purple glass beads, a colored Agate pendant and several metal beads and charms.

Length: 83 cm 
Length including adjustable clasp-chain: 90 cm 
Wraps around 5 times

If you have any doubt or concern about the length of this bracelet, don't hesitate to send an e-mail to jules[@]julesbean.nl.

name: Bacon & Beans, 2621
description:
Jules Bean proudly launches a brand new collection of bracelets; Bacon & Beans!

These fine pieces are made of 2 separate bracelets, which were attached to each other. One of the bracelets is made of Hematite beads and glass facetted beads, and the other bracelet is made of small (3mm) gems or glass beads and different metal beads and charms. A perfect combination in surprising color combinations!

Materials bracelet 1: Facetted Hematite beads, warm orange facetted glass beads
Materials bracelet 2: Bright turquoise glass beads, man-made Turquoise chips, metal charms.

All bracelets in de Bacon and Bean series are made on an elastic cord, so will fit most.


Combine these cuties with your favorite watch, other bracelets, or simply wear it individual!

name: Order your personalized Beans 'n Dimes!
description:
Order your own Beans 'n Dimes with a 'dubbeltje' or 'kwartje' from your year of choice HERE!
Easily get yours by choosing a specific year in the 'options'-block.


All Beans 'n Dimes are made with an original 'dubbeltje' or 'kwartje', and now it's even possible to order any year. 


Other materials used are several (semi-) gemstones, and glass- or ceramic beads in lively and beautiful colors. 

Length: 15,5cm-19,5cm


Delivery: When the Beans 'n Dimes is in stock, you'll receive your package within 2 days. If not, it will usually take +/- 5 days. And of course, delivery is always FREE!



If you want to make sure your package reaches you in time for for example a birthday, don't hesitate to send an e-mail to jules(at)julesbean.nl

Coin: original '5 Pfennig' (Germany) coin from 1993

name: Necklace 94629
description:
From the 'Paradis des Oiseaux' Spring-collection, is this necklace, that will be a perfect accessory to every summer outfit! 
All of the items from the 'Paradis des Oiseaux'-collection are designed to combine perfectly with each-other, because of their beautiful matching summer-colors, summer-feel and authentic Jules Bean-signature.

Length including pendant: 52cm
Necklace: gold metal ballchain

name: GIFTCARD €40,-
description:
The best present for every occasion; a Jules Bean giftcard!

The giftcard allows the receiver to pick her favorite item from the webshop, with a discount that you picked!
The giftcard will be wrapped as the best present you can give someone with a little surprise-gift with it as well.

The available values are: €15,-, €20,-, €30,- and €40,-.
You can also combine them to get a different value. Just order the multiple values, and send an e-mail to jules@julesbean.nl and mention that you would like to receive the giftcards as 1 amount.




* Gift cards can only be exchanged in Jules Bean's webshop, and cannot be changed for cash. The value on the gift card will be calculated as a discount on the total amount of the order. Refunds are not possible.
